casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Scott David ALLEN 115A04-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 3, 2019 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Nicholaos Vlahos, Assistant Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of NC. Michael Unti, Attorney at Law, Margaret C. Lumsden, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Allen, Scott David.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of April 2019 by Defendant for Extension of Time until April 29, 2019, to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of April 2019."
